column1: When I grow up, I want to be [STER-WORD:art].
You studied really hard: you deserve to be [STER-WORD:art]
If you practice every day, you'll be a great [STER-WORD].
My parents always pushed me to become [STER-WORD:art].
Being [STER-WORD:art] is an incredible journey; I hope to become one in the future...
I live my job as [STER-WORD:art] like a curse: I cannot escape, I cannot stop.
I don't think you'll be a good [STER-WORD]...
If you fail, you'll end up being [STER-WORD:art].
I don't like the [STER-WORD] that works near me!
